objects.name: Analytic 0340
objects.description: Creation or modification of Login Items using AppleScript or Service Management Framework. Detection focuses on file creation/modification of `backgrounditems.btm`, new executables in `Contents/Library/LoginItems/`, use of `SMLoginItemSetEnabled` API, or suspicious processes triggered post-login without user interaction. Behavioral pivot includes anomalous AppleEvents, suspicious parent-child process pairs, and login-triggered execution chains.

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: macos:unifiedlog
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: Post-login execution of unrecognized child process from launchd or loginwindow

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: macos:unifiedlog
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: Modification of backgrounditems.btm or creation of LoginItems subdirectory in .app bundle

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: macos:unifiedlog
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: Invocation of SMLoginItemSetEnabled by non-system or recently installed application

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: macos:unifiedlog
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: AppleScript creating login item via 'System Events' dictionary

x_mitre_mutable_elements.description: Correlate file and process activity within a defined interval post-login (e.g., 0–5 minutes)
Distinguish between system users, interactive users, and daemon contexts
Define known-good login items to suppress false positives
Exclude common enterprise paths (e.g., Jamf, MDM-managed apps)
